stateDiagram

state MENU {

        WAIT

        WAIT : WAIT

        WAIT : do / #123; wait_count++#59; #125;

        state BEVERAGE {

                WATER

                WATER : WATER

                WATER : 1. do / #123; water_count++#59; #125;

        }

        state "$initial_state" as MENU.(InitialState)

        ODD_DUCK

        ODD_DUCK : ODD_DUCK

        ODD_DUCK : 1. do / #123; duck_count++#59; #125;

        ODD_DUCK : do / #123; consume_event = true#59; #125;

}

state "$initial_state" as ROOT.(InitialState)

WAIT --> WATER : 1. do [wait_count > Y]

WATER --> ODD_DUCK : do [water_count > X]

MENU.(InitialState) --> WAIT

ODD_DUCK --> WAIT : RESET

ROOT.(InitialState) --> MENU
Events
